skills.name: DEAD EYE
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• 30% Chance to gain an Extra Turn.
• Damage dealt increases based on your SPECIAL stat.

skills.name: RAPID SPRAY
desc: • Deals 6 hits of true damage to random targets.
• 30% chance to Steal Power, Steal Fury, or Steal a Beneficial Effect on each hit.

skills.name: INFINITE VOID
desc: • Deals random damage to all enemies.
• Inflicts Lower Power Generation for 2 turns.
